mapper.sql: id, org_key, org_name, org_type_id, parent_id, created_on, created_by, updated_on, updated_by, description, created_by_type, updated_by_type, org_owner, status, email, social_credit_code, company_name, max_dept_high
mapper.select: select * from user where id in (select pk_user_id from user_org where pk_org_id = #{id}) order by last_online_on desc limit 1
select COUNT(0) from organization o, user_grant ug where ug.to_dept_id = #{deptId} and o.id = ug.org_id
SELECT lt.id from label_type lt where label_type = 0 and lt.label_name = ( SELECT lt2.label_name from org_label ol left join label_type lt2 on ol.label_id = lt2.id where ol.org_id = #{orgId} )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO org_label (id, org_id, label_id, label_name, create_by, create_time ) values (#{id}, #{orgId}, #{labelId}, #{labelName}, #{createdBy}, #{createTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE org_label SET label_id = #{labelId}, label_name = #{labelName}, update_by= #{updatedBy}, update_time= #{updatedOn} WHERE org_id = #{orgId}
mapper.select: select pk_org_id from user_org where pk_user_id = (select u.id from user u where u.phone_number = #{safePhoneNum} and user_type = 1 and deleted_flag = 0)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO organization_change ( id, pk_org_id, change_type, change_name, change_date, change_user_id, change_username, change_person, change_data ) VALUES (#{id},#{pkOrgId},#{changeType},#{changeName},#{changeDate},#{changeUserId},#{changeUsername},#{changePerson},#{changeData})
